messages.id: Please enter a number greater than {Intt}.
messages.message: Please enter a number greater than {Intt}.

messages.id: For comments or to report bugs, please visit the project page:
messages.message: For comments or to report bugs, please visit the project page:
messages.translation: 의견을 보거나 버그를 보고하려면 프로젝트 페이지를 방문하세요:

messages.id: For FRP configuration documentation, please visit the FRP project page:
messages.message: For FRP configuration documentation, please visit the FRP project page:
messages.translation: FRP 구성 문서를 보려면 FRP 프로젝트 페이지를 방문하십시오:

messages.id: An error occurred while checking for a software update.
messages.message: An error occurred while checking for a software update.
messages.translation: 소프트웨어 업데이트를 확인하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다.

messages.id: There are currently no updates available.
messages.message: There are currently no updates available.

messages.id: The file "{Path}" is not a valid ZIP file.
messages.message: The file "{Path}" is not a valid ZIP file.

messages.id: Are you sure you would like to delete config "{Name}"?
messages.message: Are you sure you would like to delete config "{Name}"?

messages.id: Are you sure that you want to delete these {Count} configs?
messages.message: Are you sure that you want to delete these {Count} configs?

messages.id: Select a local directory that the admin server will load resources from.
messages.message: Select a local directory that the admin server will load resources from.
messages.translation: 관리 서버가 리소스를 로드할 로컬 디렉토리를 선택하십시오.
신뢰할 수 있는 CA 파일 선택

messages.id: * The following features may affect the stability of the service.
messages.message: * The following features may affect the stability of the service.
messages.translation: * 다음 기능은 서비스의 안정성에 영향을 미칠 수 있습니다.

messages.id:
Unable to upgrade your config file due to proxy conversion failure, please check the proxy config and try again.

Bad proxy: {Name}
messages.message:
Unable to upgrade your config file due to proxy conversion failure, please check the proxy config and try again.

Bad proxy: {Name}
messages.translation:
프록시 변환 실패로 인해 구성 파일을 업그레이드할 수 없습니다. 프록시 구성을 확인하고 다시 시도하세요.

잘못된 프록시: {Name}

messages.id: Select a folder for directory listing.
messages.message: Select a folder for directory listing.

messages.id: The plugin does not support range ports.
messages.message: The plugin does not support range ports.

messages.id: The number of local ports should be the same as the number of remote ports.
messages.message: The number of local ports should be the same as the number of remote ports.
messages.translation: 로컬 포트 수는 원격 포트 수와 동일해야 합니다.

messages.id: Custom domains and subdomain should have at least one of these set.
messages.message: Custom domains and subdomain should have at least one of these set.
messages.translation: 사용자 정의 도메인 및 하위 도메인에는 이러한 세트가 하나 이상 있어야 합니다.

messages.id: Are you sure you would like to stop config "{Name}"?
messages.message: Are you sure you would like to stop config "{Name}"?

messages.id:
You can set a password to restrict access to this program.
You will be asked to enter it the next time you use this program.
messages.message:
You can set a password to restrict access to this program.
You will be asked to enter it the next time you use this program.
messages.translation:
이 프로그램에 대한 액세스를 제한하기 위해 암호를 설정할 수 있습니다.
다음에 이 프로그램을 사용할 때 입력하라는 메시지가 표시됩니다.

messages.id: You must restart program to apply the modification.
messages.message: You must restart program to apply the modification.
messages.translation: 수정 사항을 적용하려면 프로그램을 재시작해야 합니다.

messages.id:
Define the default value when creating a new configuration.
The value here will not affect the existing configuration.
messages.message:
Define the default value when creating a new configuration.
The value here will not affect the existing configuration.
messages.translation:
새 구성을 만들 때 기본값을 정의합니다.
여기의 값은 기존 구성에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

messages.id: This feature only supports text in INI or TOML format.
messages.message: This feature only supports text in INI or TOML format.
messages.translation: 이 기능은 INI 또는 TOML 형식의 텍스트만 지원합니다.

messages.id: Are you sure you would like to delete proxy "{Name}"?
messages.message: Are you sure you would like to delete proxy "{Name}"?

messages.id: Are you sure that you want to delete these {Count} proxies?
messages.message: Are you sure that you want to delete these {Count} proxies?

messages.id: Are you sure you would like to disable proxy "{Name}"?
messages.message: Are you sure you would like to disable proxy "{Name}"?

messages.id: Are you sure that you want to disable these {Count} proxies?
messages.message: Are you sure that you want to disable these {Count} proxies?

messages.id: * Support batch import, one link per line.
messages.message: * Support batch import, one link per line.
messages.translation: * 한 줄에 하나의 링크로 일괄 가져오기를 지원합니다.

messages.id: Please enter the correct URL list.
messages.message: Please enter the correct URL list.

messages.id: You must enter an administration password to operate the {AppLocalName}.
messages.message: You must enter an administration password to operate the {AppLocalName}.

messages.id: The password is incorrect. Re-enter password.
messages.message: The password is incorrect. Re-enter password.
messages.translation: 비밀번호가 올바르지 않습니다. 비밀번호를 다시 입력하세요.

messages.id: Please enter a number from {Number} to {Number_1}.
messages.message: Please enter a number from {Number} to {Number_1}.

messages.id: Please enter a number from {Arg_1} to {Arg_2}.
messages.message: Please enter a number from {Arg_1} to {Arg_2}.

messages.id: The text does not match the required pattern.
messages.message: The text does not match the required pattern.

messages.id: Please select one of the provided options.
messages.message: Please select one of the provided options.
